participant_1.background:
I'm not sure about their professions, but my parents are usually busy and tired when they get home from work.
I would love to have lunch with Amelia Earhart, the pioneering female pilot who inspired me to become a pilot myself.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I was a personal shopper, but I decided to change my career because I wanted to do something more meaningful.
I am proud of my brother for achieving his dream of playing football in the NFL.

content.text: I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I feel you. I'm a weightlifter and I have a disability that makes it hard to get around, but I try to stay fit and active.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of disability do you have?
I have cerebral palsy. It's a condition that affects my movement and coordination.
I'm sure it can be tough, but you seem to be doing great.
Thanks. I try. I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
That's a great idea! I love nature documentaries too.
So, what do you do for work?
Thanks. I've been weightlifting for a few years now and I love it.
I bet it's a great way to stay in shape.
It is. It's also a lot of fun.
So, what are your goals for the future?
I want to keep weightlifting and I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
Those are great goals. I'm sure you'll achieve them.
